translations: 随身用具；全部有关的事物；设备

sentences.sentence: Keep all of your laundry paraphernalia together.
Get rid of all the smoking paraphernalia in the house, your car and your purse.
sentences.translation: 把家里、车上、钱包里与香烟相关的物件都拿掉。

sentences.sentence: Skip the art museum, and head to the halls filled with quirky and fun paraphernalia.
sentences.translation: 别去美术馆，去那些收纳有趣和古怪随身品的博物馆吧。
